positions.comment: At anchor in Dundas Bay rafted to Abysinnia
At achor in Pavlof Harbor, Chicagoff Island
At achor in Appleton Cove, Peril Strait
Anchored in Klu Bay. Heading for Ketchikan today.
Back at the dock in Ketchikan
Left Dora Bay, via Ketchikan and Prince Rupert to Spicer Anchorage.
Anchored in Monckton Inlete after a foggy passage.
At anchor in Codville Lagoon hoping from two traps full of prawns.
at anchor in Pierce Bay. No luck fishing today.
